Verses: 1 engalukku Alla, Karththaave, Engalukku Alla, Umadhu Kirubaiyinimiththamum, Umadhu Saththiyaththinimiththamum, Ummudaiya Naamaththirke Magimai Varappannum.
2 avargaludaiya Dhevan Ippozhudhu Enge Endru Purajaadhigal Solvaanen?
3 nammudaiya Dhevan Paralogaththil Irukkiraar; Thamakku Siththamaana Yaavaiyum Seygiraar.
4 avargaludaiya Vikkiragangal Velliyum Ponnum, Manusharudaiya Kaivelaiyumaayirukkiradhu.
5 avaigalukku Vaayirundhum Pesaadhu; Avaigalukku Kangalirundhum Kaanaadhu.
6 avaigalukku Kaadhugalirundhum Kelaadhu; Avaigalukku Mookkirundhum Mugaraadhu.
7 avaigalukkuk Kaigalirundhum Thodaadhu; Avaigalukku Kaalgalirundhum Nadavaadhu; Thangal Thondaiyaal Saththamidavum Maattaadhu.
8 avaigalai Pannugiravargalum, Avaigalai Nambugiravargal Yaavarum, Avaigalaippolave Irukkiraargal.
9 isravele, Karththarai Nambu; Avare Avargalukku Thunaiyum Avargalukku Kedagamumaayirukkiraar.
10 aaron Kudumbaththaare, Karththarai Nambungal; Avare Avargalukku Thunaiyum Avargalukku Kedagamumaayirukkiraar.
11 karththarukkup Bayappadugiravargale, Karththarai Nambungal; Avare Avargalukku Thunaiyum Avargalukku Kedagamumaayirukkiraar.
12 karththar Nammai Ninaiththirukkiraar, Avar Aaseervadhippaar; Isravel Kudumbaththaarai Aaseervadhippaar, Avar Aaron Kudumbaththaarai Aaseervadhippaar.
15 vaanaththaiyum Boomiyaiyum Padaiththa Karththaraale Neengal Aaseervadhikkappattavargal.
17 mariththavargalum Mavunaththil Irangugira Anaivarum Karththarai Thudhiyaargal.
18 naamo, Idhumudhal Endrendraikkum Karththarai Sthoththirippom. Allelooyaa.
